Html:
Yeah, this is really weird behavior.  I was able to browse all the files in a new d/l of Oxite, but once I'd resolved all the dependencies and successfully built the solution (which works fine; can browse, edit contents, etc), I can't open anything from the /views/* folders or else VS crashes. I get a really cryptic error in my event log as well:

.NET Runtime version 2.0.50727.3603 - Fatal Execution Engine Error (6FC16050) (80131506)

 

Any ideas?  I've tryed several times now, new locations, new installs of all the dependencies, etc.  Same problem no matter what I do.  I have VS 2k8, latest patches and such installed.
Looks like this was due to a missing hotfix having to do w/ Visual Studio. The oxite connection was temporal only.  Sorry!
